Articles.Content:
I want to make a new KSP video for my little youtube channel, but i don't know what to make! I have some ideas, though:

I could make a video about me trying to make a successful seaplane (many splashes and crashes await)

Or i could make a video of me blowing stuff up with my war machines

Or i could make a showcase video showing some of my most epicest creations

Or i could narrate a video of one of my spaceflights (i've never narrated before, but i'd be willing to give it a try)

Or i could do something entirely different!

What do you think i should do?

Edited July 26, 2014 by quasarrgames

If you don't like these options, feel free to tell me other ones that you want me to do.

Go on, don't be shy.

Make a series where you build a massive mothership, and attempt to land a Kerbal on every celestial body in the system. With epic narration, of course.

In one flight.
